ComicInfo.Summary:
It's been a long and crazy road for Anne, but can it finally come to an end? While desperately racing to save Erin from the maniacal Suture, Anne finds herself face to face with the man who 'screwed' her out of her happy life. Broken, exhausted and desperately holding onto sanity, she's the only one who can possibly stop the monsters and save Erin before it's too late! Don't miss this electrifying final chapter of Tyler Kirkham's Screwed!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Tyler Kirkham & Oracle | 1 | B | Cover B | David Miller & Oracle | 2 | C | Cover C | Oracle | 3 | Digital | Digital Cover | Tyler Kirkham & Oracle | 4 |
